amendatorysection.catchline: Qualifying organizations; constitution and bylaws or articles of incorporation; file; Attorney General; duties.
amendatorysection.para: Qualifying organizations shall adopt and file with the Secretary of State a constitution and bylaws or articles of incorporation which are consistent with the purposes of sections 2-2801 to 2-2812. The Attorney General shall render an opinion as to the eligibility of each association or society to receive and use appropriated funds.
